12. PROPOSED FLAG POLE. REFER TO CONSTRUCTION DETAILS, SHEET CB.3.

24. PROPOSED SWING GATE. REFER TO CONSTRUCTION DETAILS, SHEET C8.4.
26. PROPOSED DROP-OFF SHELTER. REFER TO ARCHITECTURAL PLANS FOR DETAILS.
27. PROPOSED 4 TALL CHAINLINK FENCE. REFER TO CONSTRUCTION DETAILS.
